[Record exercise] Record running, cycling, walking, mountaineering and other sports modes, and view their detailed data, including exercise trajectory, exercise heart rate, pace and other data
[Change dial] You can change your favorite dial through the online dial, and can customize it
[Set reminder] After connecting the device, you can set alarm reminders, sedentary reminders, message notification reminders, etc.
[Share Achievement] You can share your achievement data with your friends
